content.html: Hi @TwitterSafety, Graham Linehan (@glinner) was banned from Twitter due to transphobic hate. Unfortunately, he has a new account now: @oliophi. I have reported it, but was unable to add this additional context. Hopefully others can report, and help bring this to your attention.
content.value:
Hi @TwitterSafety, Graham Linehan (@glinner) was banned from Twitter due to transphobic hate. Unfortunately, he has a new account now: @oliophi.

I have reported it, but was unable to add this additional context. Hopefully others can report, and help bring this to your attention.
